form.orderPlaceholder: Enter link or post ID to boost

toast.warningContent: Currently, FB is scanning ALL orders on Server 1 and Server 2. No refunds under any circumstances. Please consider before ordering. Only public Video/Livestream orders are supported. We do NOT support refunds!
toast.notificationContent:
Prohibitions:
1. No misleading information.
2. No unethical or illegal actions.
3. No spreading false or harmful information.
4. No inappropriate content for children.
toast.errorService: Unable to load service information. Please try again later.
toast.errorServiceTime: Unable to load service time information. Please try again later.

instructions: # Do not place a second order on the same link before your current order is completed in the system.
instaInstructions1: When the service is busy, the process start time will vary.
Do not place a second order using the same link until your current order is completed in the system.
In case of any issues with the service, please contact support.
